notes: Initial run. Build failed due to dependency issues, relying on static analysis.

bottlenecks: DoctorCard image could use import for blur placeholder (minor)
NeuraLinkBookingApp background uses mix-blend-multiply and blur-3xl on large areas, causing high paint cost.
LocationMapEmbed uses iframe but is optimized with click-to-load.

changes.description: Removed expensive mix-blend-multiply and redundant filter class from background decoration. Added pointer-events-none.
changes.expected_impact: Reduced Paint/Composite cost, improving Interaction to Next Paint (INP) and LCP on low-end devices.
changes.verification: Visual check (background should look similar), Performance trace (paint time reduction).
